summary: This document appears to be a daily assignment log or roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering dates in July and August 2019. It lists shift assignments, days off, sick leave, and overtime for a staff member assigned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU #3). The document is dated 8/12/2019, which is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and during the period he was held at MCC New York.

events.title: Staff Return Travel and Overtime
events.description: A staff member had return travel and overtime recorded from 08:00-08:30, and was also assigned to LANS 2 OTM/W 2 and SHU #3 P/M 10 on the same day.

events.title: Staff Overtime
events.description: A staff member worked overtime from 22:00-00:00 on LANS 2 OT and was assigned to SHU #3 P/M 10.

events.title: Staff Sick Leave
events.description: A staff member took sick leave.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment log for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 12, 2019.
The log covers the period from July 22, 2019, to August 17, 2019, which includes the time Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at MCC New York prior to his death.
The primary assignment for the staff member was 'SHU #3 P/M 10', indicating work in the Special Housing Unit, likely where high-profile inmates like Epstein were held.
The document records routine staff activities including shifts, days off, sick leave, and overtime, providing insight into prison operations during this critical period.
No specific individuals are named in this excerpt; it appears to be an administrative record of staff assignments.
